s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: Avalon Excalibur was created in order to ease development of new projects. To that end, Excalibur contains a number of ready to use components and utilities that handle everything from command line parsing to thread concurrency management.

Not all of the code in excalibur CVS nor all the packages listed in the menu have been released; some are in an alpha or planning stage. Individual packages inside Excalibur that have been released can be downloaded from here, whereas the last complete release of all of excalibur is available here.
s1.warn: Packages that have not been officially released are of varying quality and/or stability. They are NOT meant for production use. You have been warned.
